pkgmetadata.longdescription: # accsyn-python-apiOfficial accsyn fast film delivery Python APIComplete Python API reference can be found [here](https://support.accsyn.com/python-api).Changelog:----------See doc/release_notes.rstHenrik Norin, HDR AB, 2022accsyn(r) - secure data delivery and workflow synchttps://accsyn.com https://support.accsyn.com
